changelog:
## Changes in v1.0.41

### Sport Section - UI Flow Fixed
- FIXED: No more preview appearing on left side
- FIXED: Loading overlay shown during channel load
- FIXED: Preview starts AND goes fullscreen together
- FIXED: Channels load correctly before fullscreen
- Channel switching now works properly

### Previous fixes
- v1.0.40: Channel numbering fix (partial)
- v1.0.38: Smart Sync with MD5 hash check
- v1.0.37: Sport fullscreen navigation
